trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around July 21st 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home on Fodren waiting to turn left on Westhiemer. I noticed in the overcast sky a black orb moving straight in a NOrth West direction. It moved rather quickly, about the same speed and altitude as I have seen helicopters travel in that area. It maintained the same altitude as it traveled accross th sky. I had to turn finally and buildng and trees obstructed my view. When I could see the Northern horizon again, the object was gone. It didn't wobble, it moved with purpoe and didn't look like a balloon.
Summary: A black orb moving accoss the sky
